ca.ualberta.ishelf

Class LORRecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<LORRecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • ca.ualberta.ishelf.LORRecyclerViewAdapter

  • public class LORRecyclerViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<LORRecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
    This is the adapter for the List of requests for the recycler view
    Author:
    : Randal Kimpinski
